config.title: DevScope API
config.host.description: Listening host. Use 127.0.0.1 by default for safety.
config.defaultScope.description: Default diagnostics scope when not specified by query params.
config.language.description: Display language for notifications and messages.
notifications.portBusy: Port {0} is already in use. Please free up the port or choose a different port.
notifications.noPortsAvailable: Ports {0}-{1} are all in use. Please check your network or change to a different port range.
notifications.permissionDenied: Permission denied for port {0}. Try using a higher port (above 1024) or run with administrator privileges.
notifications.configChanged: DevScope config changed. Restart server to apply?
